title: Thunderbird is crashin non stop to the point I cannot even use the software
content:
Program keeps crashing. I am running the latest version with windows 11. I have even ran in troubleshoot mode with everything disabled and still crashing. It wont even submit the crash report is says it failed. Here is the crash report it gives me.
